EmailTemplate.name: Spring-2013_UserGroups.Reminder_April22_Grafton_MA
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - TriTech's 2013 Perform Spring User Groups
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> 2013 Perform Spring User Groups REMINDER Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Just sending a reminder about the following User Group Meeting that you are registered for:
Name: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=edit me}} Attendee #1: {{lead.Contact 1:default=edit me}} Attendee #2: {{lead.Contact 2:default=edit me}} Attendee #3: {{lead.Contact 3:default=edit me}} Attendee #4: {{lead.Contact 4:default=edit me}} Service Name: {{company.Company Name:default=edit me}}
Registered for: Grafton PD User Group Date: Monday, April 22, 2013 Time: 9 AM to 3 PM Address: 28 Providence Road, Grafton MA <https://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&channel=fflb&q=28+Providence+Road,+Grafton++MA&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x89e40eeabffee6ff:0x64b1f24997bfaa22,28+Providence+Rd,+Grafton,+MA+01519&gl=us&ei=oKxJUYqGLK614AOdkIHwDA&ved=0CDMQ8gEwAA>
If you need to make any changes or cancel your reservation, please contact your Client Account Manager, David Bell.
David Bell (774) 239-3722 david.bell@tritech.com <mailto:david.bell@tritech.com>
We look forward to seeing you soon! User Group Agenda 9 AM - 3 PM Perform Product Suite – features available in Version 6.1 and what’s coming in Version 6.2 Perform Support Team – Customer Service Center (new support portal) Sales Programs – product promotions and activities Update on the Perform Training Institute – Upcoming Regional Classes and the Fall Training Summit On-site lunch (complimentary) Complimentary Security Training – a TriTech Software Trainer will provide training on how to manage security rights within the Perform software. You will learn how to manage individual and group rights as well as additional security settings such as challenge questions, strong passwords, and user account lock outs.
